SEARCH
Package utils

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
utils.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Utility class containing helper methods for input validation and formatting. Includes methods for handling different types of user inputs such as integers, doubles, currency, strings, and dates.

    • printDivider

      public static void printDivider(int width, String symbol)
      Prints a divider line of a specified width using a custom symbol.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the divider.
      symbol - The symbol to use for the divider.

    • inputInteger

      public static int inputInteger(Scanner scanner, String prompt, boolean canBeNegative)
      Prompts the user for an integer input and validates it. The input can optionally be negative depending on the canBeNegative flag.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read input.
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      canBeNegative - Flag indicating whether the number can be negative.
      Returns:
      The valid integer input from the user.

    • inputDouble

      public static double inputDouble(Scanner scanner, String prompt, boolean canBeNegative)
      Prompts the user for a double input and validates it. The input can optionally be negative depending on the canBeNegative flag.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read input.
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      canBeNegative - Flag indicating whether the number can be negative.
      Returns:
      The valid double input from the user.

    • inputCurrency

      public static BigDecimal inputCurrency(Scanner scanner, String prompt)
      Prompts the user for a currency input and validates it as a positive amount.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read input.
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      Returns:
      The valid BigDecimal input representing the currency.

    • inputString

      public static String inputString(Scanner scanner, String prompt)
      Prompts the user for a non-empty string input.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read input.
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      Returns:
      The valid string input from the user.

    • inputString

      public static String inputString(Scanner scanner, String prompt, boolean canBeEmpty)
      Prompts the user for a string input, allowing empty input if specified.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read input.
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      canBeEmpty - Flag indicating whether the input can be empty.
      Returns:
      The valid string input from the user.

    • getValidDate

      public static Date getValidDate(Scanner scanner, String prompt)
      Prompts the user for a valid date input and validates it. The date must be later than today's date.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner object used to read input.
      prompt - The prompt message to display to the user.
      Returns:
      The valid Date object.

    • extractIds

      public static List<Integer> extractIds(List<? extends Person> persons)
      Extracts the IDs of a list of persons.
      Parameters:
      persons - The list of persons whose IDs are to be extracted.
      Returns:
      A list of integer IDs of the persons.
